name: Stack & Defend
description:
Stack & Defend is kind of like Angry Birds in reverse. Stack wood and steel blocks to defend some people against a cannonball attack. Put your building skills to the test in 6 challenging scenarios.

How to play

  • Click on the grid to place blocks
  • Right click to delete blocks
  • Use the buttons on the left side to change block types
  • Click Ready when you're done building
  • To win a scenario, at least one person must survive

(this game was originally released as "bad wall builder" in 2012)
